Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: you should ask "what is the worst that can happen if X is compromised?"   If the answer it's all dead, then it's centralized. In case of dPoW the absolute worst case is that the blockchains must rely on their ordinary consensus, without checkpoints, until the situation normalizes
